# boundingBox

**Instance Property**

The bounding region of the scene to which light probes are being added.

## Declaration

```swift
var boundingBox: MDLAxisAlignedBoundingBox { get set }
```

## Discussion

When you call the [doc://com.apple.modelio/documentation/ModelIO/MDLAsset] [doc://com.apple.modelio/documentation/ModelIO/MDLAsset/placeLightProbes(withDensity:heuristic:using:)] method to automatically distribute light probes in a scene, Model I/O reads this property to ask your code which regions should be evaluated for light probe placement.

## Providing Light Probe Information

- **sphericalHarmonicsLevel**: The number of levels of spherical harmonics information provided by the data source.
- **sphericalHarmonicsCoefficients(atPosition:)**: Asks the data source to provide spherical harmonics coefficients that describe lighting conditions in all directions from the specified point in a scene.
